title: Off to School (The Adventures of MS Addie Pants)
features: A motivating true story about overcoming bullying by learning to love oneself—no matter what!
Ms. Addie Pants the dog is excited to start school and learn fun things.
Eager to meet new friends she finds that it isn’t easy. No one on the bus to school is making it comfortable for Addie.
Will Addie be able to overcome the bullying so she can succeed in school?
is aimed at helping kids to love oneself no matter what happens. That bullies can’t keep one from success. And that friendship is cherished.
The Adventures of Ms. Addie Pants
series. It is a testament for success, wisdom, and feeling good about accomplishments.
If you or your child like dog stories, learning to overcome bullies, and embracing one’s own gifts, then you’ll adore Wendy Van de Poll’s beautifully illustrated true story.
and discover that perseverance assures confidence.
All Books in The Ms. Addie Pants Series
Three Free Color Pages are available for download once you purchase Book 1, The Rescue.
Three Free Color Pages are available for download once you purchase Book 1, The Rescue.
description: I wrote The Ms. Addie Pants series as a tribute to my sweet, kind, empathic puppy (now 6 yo). She graced our lives and melted our hearts and in turn we made her feel safe, loved, and secure.

To receive notification when more books are published, please go to WendyVandePoll dot com

Wendy "Ann" Van de Poll has rescued puppies and all kinds of animals since she was 5-years old. She is a bestselling and award-winning author, speaker and pet loss grief specialist. Wendy has run with the wolves in Minnesota, coyotes in Massachusetts, and foxes in her backyard. To learn more please go to wendyvandepoll.com
